title: Microeconomics Mobile Learning Design: ADDIE Model-Based Self-Directed Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of College-Level Basic Economics Concepts
context.additional_context: Flexible learning environment using Android-based mobile applications

learning_goals: Learners can explain core microeconomic concepts—such as supply-demand models, consumer theory, and production theory—with over 80% accuracy in a mobile learning environment.
Through gamified simulations, learners can analyze real-world economic problems and propose optimal decision-making strategies.
Using mobile learning tools, learners can complete team-based projects (e.g., market analysis reports) and meet at least 75% of assessment criteria.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
